title: Chukzy1992
author: Chukzy1992
content: First what is education;education is key to success and also an important issues in one's life, it brings out the inner qualities of an individual.Having education in an area helps people think positive and behave in a way that contributes to there success and also the community or society where they finds themselves.In addition it deals with human capacity on how to relate with people around them.Futhermore, education grants us a good status in the society, and also gives us that self confidence where ever we finds ourselves.In conclusion "education is very important in our society today, it helps you choose a better career in life.so Therefore, education is deemed a real success behind any future success.

comments.author: Lainta
comments.body: Quote from: Chukzy1992 on March 23, 2023, 11:24:01 AMFirst what is education;education is key to success and also an important issues in one's life, it brings out the inner qualities of an individual.Having education in an area helps people think positive and behave in a way that contributes to there success and also the community or society where they finds themselves.In addition it deals with human capacity on how to relate with people around them.Futhermore, education grants us a good status in the society, and also gives us that self confidence where ever we finds ourselves.In conclusion "education is very important in our society today, it helps you choose a better career in life.so Therefore, education is deemed a real success behind any future success.   I fully agree with your statement that education is key to success and an essential aspect of an individual's life. Education is a process of acquiring knowledge, skills, values, and beliefs that enable individuals to understand and navigate the world around them.Education empowers individuals to make informed decisions, pursue their goals, and achieve success in their chosen fields. It provides a platform for personal growth and development, fosters critical thinking and problem-solving skills, and enhances creativity and innovation.Furthermore, education is not limited to formal academic settings; it can also be obtained through practical experience, informal learning, and self-study. Regardless of the mode of education, the benefits are numerous and far-reaching.As you rightly stated, education also contributes to the betterment of society. Educated individuals tend to be more socially responsible and aware, and they are better equipped to contribute to the growth and development of their communities.In summary, education is a fundamental human right and a vital tool for personal and societal development. It is the key to unlocking one's full potential and achieving success in life.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Some newborn babies seem to understand the language of their parents within only a week or two. Many babies have learned so much language that they can actually follow conversations by the time that they are one year old.How long does it take to learn Chinese? How many characters are in the Chinese language?Quote from: https://studycli.org/chinese-characters/number-of-characters-in-chinese/The number of unique Chinese characters used through the ages, though the exact figure is unknown, is safely in excess of 100,000. The largest number ever recorded in a Chinese dictionary—the Taiwan Ministry of Education's 2004 Dictionary of Chinese Character Variants (異體字字典, Yìtǐzì zìdiǎn)—was 106,230. Only a subset of these characters are still in regular use today.How many Chinese characters do Chinese people know and use in their language?Quote from: https://www.tutormandarin.net/en/how-many-characters-are-there-in-the-chinese-alphabet/No one knows all the Chinese words though. Think about it, do you know all the words in an English dictionary? Probably not. A Chinese person of average education should know about 3,500 characters. A literate Chinese person may know 6,000 to 7,000 characters.The point is, education is everything. No wonder that, even though there are more and greater 'spikes' of high intelligence in Westerners, average Chinese people are way more intelligent than average Westerners. The Chinese have to learn way more difficult operations of language just to live than do Westerners. It's exercise. And practiced education exercise is the way to strengthen the brain.

comments.author: Queentoshi
comments.body: Quote from: Chukzy1992 on March 23, 2023, 11:24:01 AMFirst what is education;education is key to success and also an important issues in one's life, it brings out the inner qualities of an individual.Having education in an area helps people think positive and behave in a way that contributes to there success and also the community or society where they finds themselves.In addition it deals with human capacity on how to relate with people around them.Futhermore, education grants us a good status in the society, and also gives us that self confidence where ever we finds ourselves.In conclusion "education is very important in our society today, it helps you choose a better career in life.so Therefore, education is deemed a real success behind any future success. Being Educated is not all about going to school to get a particular career, that's where most people get it wrong, education makes us think and know how to do things the right way, improve our thinking and most especially how to communicate in the outside world. That's why we see people making use of some words, like for example. He don't do things like someone that is educated. That's why education is very good to our society today, because we are not just going to school to learn a skill but how to develop our society.

comments.author: Ndabagi01
comments.body: Quote from: Chukzy1992 on March 23, 2023, 11:24:01 AMFirst what is education;education is key to success and also an important issues in one's life, it brings out the inner qualities of an individual.Having education in an area helps people think positive and behave in a way that contributes to there success and also the community or society where they finds themselves.In addition it deals with human capacity on how to relate with people around them.Futhermore, education grants us a good status in the society, and also gives us that self confidence where ever we finds ourselves.In conclusion "education is very important in our society today, it helps you choose a better career in life.so Therefore, education is deemed a real success behind any future success.   Being educated does not only refer to the four walls of a classroom; it extends beyond those confines. You can be educated in the classroom but not in life, which will temper and cause negative effects on your success. When it comes to being successful with education, discipline plays a big role. Being educated and not disciplined brings more bad luck than good. Successful people always get it right in the classroom and in society to be labeled as "successful."

comments.author: Minecache
comments.body: Quote from: Queentoshi on March 23, 2023, 07:51:51 PMQuote from: Chukzy1992 on March 23, 2023, 11:24:01 AMFirst what is education;education is key to success and also an important issues in one's life, it brings out the inner qualities of an individual.Having education in an area helps people think positive and behave in a way that contributes to there success and also the community or society where they finds themselves.In addition it deals with human capacity on how to relate with people around them.Futhermore, education grants us a good status in the society, and also gives us that self confidence where ever we finds ourselves.In conclusion "education is very important in our society today, it helps you choose a better career in life.so Therefore, education is deemed a real success behind any future success. Being Educated is not all about going to school to get a particular career, that's where most people get it wrong, education makes us think and know how to do things the right way, improve our thinking and most especially how to communicate in the outside world. That's why we see people making use of some words, like for example. He don't do things like someone that is educated. That's why education is very good to our society today, because we are not just going to school to learn a skill but how to develop our society.It is interesting to hear what you are saying, learning is not just about getting a job, but education teaches us to be human, knowledge… all the basic things to prepare us for life. Many people mistakenly believe that the purpose of education is just to get a job, and with the current unemployment of bachelors, many people think that education is expensive and unnecessary. It is a very misconception, they cannot get a job after graduation, and they blame education while they have never looked back at themselves and what they have learned and accomplished. Those who despise education will always fail in all areas of life.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Quote from: Chukzy1992 on March 23, 2023, 11:24:01 AMFirst what is education;education is key to success and also an important issues in one's life, it brings out the inner qualities of an individual.It is one of the key of the success but it's not the only key. There's still the measurement for someone's character if he's educated and not but I guess that differs from one's perspective on how they look what's an actual educated person and who's not.Quote from: Chukzy1992 on March 23, 2023, 11:24:01 AMHaving education in an area helps people think positive and behave in a way that contributes to there success and also the community or society where they finds themselves.In addition it deals with human capacity on how to relate with people around them.Futhermore, education grants us a good status in the society, and also gives us that self confidence where ever we finds ourselves.In conclusion "education is very important in our society today, it helps you choose a better career in life.so Therefore, education is deemed a real success behind any future success.That's true that if someone is known to have an education, he's gonna get a good status in the society. But, it's not all about the status because someone may be educated but not respected. If you know what I mean from that because being educated doesn't only mean that he's able to finish studies and college but today, it's also counted about having a good behavior, manners and right conduct.

A literate Chinese person may know 6,000 to 7,000 characters.The point is, education is everything. No wonder that, even though there are more and greater 'spikes' of high intelligence in Westerners, average Chinese people are way more intelligent than average Westerners. The Chinese have to learn way more difficult operations of language just to live than do Westerners. It's exercise. And practiced education exercise is the way to strengthen the brain.Yes it can also be obtain through a practical experience as you said...

comments.author: Sakanwa
comments.body: Education is the integral part of life without it you can neither associate nor make decisions do not get me wrong by saying that  people without educational qualifications or background cannot associate or make decisions but in our society today it requires qualified and educated one's to carryout decisions and order reason being that the system today is exposed and broad

comments.author: Popkon6
comments.body: Quote from: Chukzy1992 on March 23, 2023, 11:24:01 AMFirst what is education;education is key to success and also an important issues in one's life, it brings out the inner qualities of an individual.Having education in an area helps people think positive and behave in a way that contributes to there success and also the community or society where they finds themselves.In addition it deals with human capacity on how to relate with people around them.Futhermore, education grants us a good status in the society, and also gives us that self confidence where ever we finds ourselves.In conclusion "education is very important in our society today, it helps you choose a better career in life.so Therefore, education is deemed a real success behind any future success.   Going to school to get an education means acquiring knowledge. Many people think that being educated will lead to great jobs but this is never realistic. If you are self-educated then surely any job you get will demand you. So getting an education does not mean entering school to get a job. Education helps us to develop positive and positive thoughts that point us in a positive direction. If you are educated you can talk to people from many countries or exchange your self. Acquiring education leads to good manners and conduct with people which helps in building a good environment and society.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Everybody needs a certain level of education. High School level English & Maths is enough to succeed in life in my opinion, you don’t need a college degree to be successful. So many people go to college & study useless degrees without a plan of what career field they wish to pursue. So it’s important to be educated to a certain level, high standard education isn’t needed to be a success.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Quote from: Chukzy1992 on March 23, 2023, 11:24:01 AMFirst what is education;education is key to success and also an important issues in one's life, it brings out the inner qualities of an individual.Having education in an area helps people think positive and behave in a way that contributes to there success and also the community or society where they finds themselves.In addition it deals with human capacity on how to relate with people around them.Futhermore, education grants us a good status in the society, and also gives us that self confidence where ever we finds ourselves.In conclusion "education is very important in our society today, it helps you choose a better career in life.so Therefore, education is deemed a real success behind any future success.   Education is necessary for you to be able to read and write. If you can read and write,I feel you have gotten the basics of education. Travelling to other places and different country is also part of education and to me I will say it is the best,in the sense that you will learn other peoples  culture, the way they behave and how they live their lives because it will be different from the country where you are from. Education doesn't mean have high degrees ,exposure is also another way you can educate yourself. Some persons are highly educated,but they talk to people rudely and don't accept other people's opinion because they think that they know all.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: Chukzy1992 on March 23, 2023, 11:24:01 AMeducation is key to success.Being educated can contribute to success but it is not the key to success. Success is a word that people find have different meaning. What you consider success may not have the same status to another person. If it is success defined in terms of how much someone owns, then definitely it cannot be education alone, because there will be uneducated men and women who have managed to find success in their various fields. Education is important because it can help affect the way a person thinks. School is not also education, people have attended schools and still do not act educated. Education can make you a better member of the community.

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: If we all go for education in the society, our thinking mentality will change and the manner to how we approach things will as well change, lack of education brings about being on a set back to the current development in the community and world at large, education serves as an eye opener, it gives opportunities, it makes people wise and give positive attention to areas of their lives needed to be taken care of, this also gives them voice to speak and be bold about what they are saying.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: Chukzy1992 on March 23, 2023, 11:24:01 AMFirst what is education;education is key to success and also an important issues in one's life, it brings out the inner qualities of an individual.   I don't agree with your definition of education that it is the key to success. It is also important to state the type of education you are referring to because we have formal and informal education. Formal education these days equip educands with theoretical knowledge that make them unemployable. The focus of these institutions of learning is to issue certificates while their graduates become job seekers. That is why I will not accept your definition of education because I have seen many perceived well-educated people that are not successful.   QuoteHaving education in an area helps people think positive and behave in a way that contributes to there success and also the community or society where they finds themselves.In addition it deals with human capacity on how to relate with people around them.Futhermore, education grants us a good status in the society, and also gives us that self confidence where ever we finds ourselves.In conclusion "education is very important in our society today, it helps you choose a better career in life.so Therefore, education is deemed a real success behind any future success.Quality education should be multi-dimensional. It should build the character, intellect, and minds of students. A graduate that can take or give bribes is not well educated. A so-called educated individual that steals from the government is not enlightened. A graduate that cannot make a positive contribution to his community is a failure. The contribution might not necessarily be money, but ideas or public awareness are even more important than money. There is no doubt education is important but the emphasis should be placed on the positive change in the physical, mental, and emotion of students and not just on certificates.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Education is, was, and will always be the most important need for societal development. Education was once only available to kings and the very wealthy people. However, now education is freely available to everyone. We must continue to avail this opportunity.Thousands of lectures covering various fields are now available on YouTube, and distance learning is a great gift for us today. However, many people are still not using it for learning.We must dedicate most of our time to gain education. Thousands are enrolled in various disciplines not to gain education but for sake of getting a job. Only few people are dedicated towards education, and they give their best to learn as much as they possibly can.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Education is very important to the politicians in power. They use it to indoctrinate the students into their political thinking. And the students don't even realize what is happening most of the time.

comments.author: Raceonsucced
comments.body: Yes, knowledge is the key to success. Knowledge can also be a light for yourself and others. Knowledge is a light when we are in darkness. That's why knowledge is very important.
